title: Go and sack whoever is in charge of balance
body:
Recently there was the nonsense with top lane breaking with Darius and Fiora plus Mordekaiser bot with 70%+ win rates above plat.

Then you do this whole bot lane nonsense.

Riot, FIRE WHOEVER IS IN CHARGE OF BALANCE, they are clearly fucking stupid beyond belief.

In what way is balanced to give someone complete domination of a lane with near 0 chance of beating without basically running 3v2 lane

You're fucking morons Riot
